reviews.review: Игра бомба,чуть ли не лучшая в жанре хоррор.У каждого персонажа есть свои уникальные навыки,которые прям хочется все быстрее и быстрее прокачать. Если играть в соло будет не очень интересно, зато очень атмосферно,а если играть с друзьями то прям изумительно. Короче, если хотите скоротать вечер,под захватывающую игру,с супер атмосферой,то настоятельно рекомендую к покупке.Особенно если урвать со скидкой,благо они проходят часто.

Oyun 13.Cuma jason gibi bir oyun bazıları çakması diye ön yargılı davrancak ama 5 jeneratör yap kapıyı aç amacıyla birlikte peşimizde de katil bulunuyor. Dead by Daylight oyununu yaklaşık 1.5 yıldır oynuyorum bıraktığım zamanlar geri döndüğüm zamanlarla birlikte şuan 200+ saatim var oyunda ki amaç güzel olduğu için bu kadar süre oynadım. Girdiğimiz bir maçta random katil gelebiliyor bu da iyi ama bazı katiller dengesiz olabiliyor yani katil oynayan kötü oyuncu bile olsa kullandığı katil kurbanla dengesiz olduğu için bazen tatsızlık olabiliyor bu katillerden bir kaçı en azından benim zorlandıklarım.

Oni:
Katil kan baloncuklarını bi yere kadar topladıktan sonra sonic gibi yüksek hızlara çıkıyor bu da kurbanların kaçmasına fırsat vermiyor 360 atmak gibi taktikler katilin vuruşunu ıskalatır ama bu katil de aimbot gibi kurbana otomatik vurma da var bana bu oyunu hediye eden arkadaşım o katili alıp kendisi 8-10 rank arası gezen biri olup 1-3 rank adamları rezil ediyor.

Siluet:
Katil kurbanları izleyerek bütün kurbanlara karşı bir süreliğine tek atma özelliği açıyor bu da çok dengesiz olmuş.

Nurse:
Katil boost basıp vuruyor genelde alanlar rezil oluyor ama bileni cıkarsa dagıtıyor fakat dengesizlik diye bir şey yok çünkü herkes kullanamıyor.

Daha katil de var dengesiz olan ama onları yazmayacam zaten benim kadar oynayanlar bilir oyuna ilk girdiğiniz de ilk karşılaşcağınız dengesizlik te her yerde kurban asılacak kanca olması asılacak olan kişinin kancasını sabote etmek yaramıyor çünkü hemen yakınında 1 tane daha oluyor oyunun burasıda çok dengesiz olmuş.

kurbanların tek dengesizlik avantajı ne diye sorarsanız bana göre basement da katil oyalamak o kadar kolay ki oyalaması katil oyalanmamak için sizi bırakıyor.

Aynı zaman da dbd oyuncularını topladığımız sunucumuz var sizde hemen katılarak kendinize ekip bulabilirsiniz: https://discord.gg/ZPsJWr2

Where to start. When you first purchase this game, it will be terrifying in every way. You don't know what you're doing, you don't know what your teammates are doing, you don't know what the killer is doing, etc. I remember starting out and not liking the game because I didn't know everything as well as you really should to really enjoy the game. Once you get the basics out of the way (learning what each killer does, knowing the meta, etc.) the game instantly becomes much more enjoyable. For me, this point came in around the 50 hour mark, but I don't know what other peoples where. This is one of the few games where I wish I could go back to the very beginner stages because learning it was a thrill and genuinely scary.
The reason this game is so fun is the wide range of things you can do. If you want to run killer all game, you can set up a build of perks to do that. If you want to rush the generators to get the world record for fastest escape (all of my killer games i swear) you can do that. If you don't want to play against the killer at all, you can BE the killer. This game has something for anyone who likes being horrified or horrifying others.
Even with almost 200 hours in the game, there are 2 killers who still genuinely make me jump almost every time. That is the Hag and the Oni. The hag has traps she places on the ground, so that could be expected. The Oni is just terrifying in general. Everything about him from his audio, to his looks, to his abilities always keep me on the edge of my seat. Once you play a bit more, the other killers don't typically scare you AS MUCH. There is the occasional spirit jump scare or nurse blinking  in front of your face. 
Why is this game better than the other competitors? I would have to say the licenced characters. Michael Myers, Bubba, Pinhead; all of them are incredibly cool and fun to play and to play against. Even the characters who aren't licenced, are still incredibly fun to play and to play against. Of course, the perks in this game are very un-even in terms of balanced and whats good and whats bad, and you will usually see the same 15 perks ran across every build (assuming people have the perks). For survivors, I think the most used perks are dead hard, decisive strike, borrowed time, and probably a good mix between iron will and quick and quiet. Of course you will see a lot of other perks, especially in lower elo lobbies.
For killer, the meta perks consist of Hex: Ruin, Hex: No one escapes death (ran with certain killers usually), Pop goes the weasel, and barbecue and chilli. Those are what I've found to be the most common perks of all currently. 
I can't speak about how good matchmaking is now, because they JUST switched systems 4 days before writing this, so its to early to fully tell, but currently my killer games are feeling too hard, and my survivor games to easy. But I'll give it some more time before final decisions.
Now would I recommend this game to people? If you're into horror games / movies, 100% recommended. You will see some familiar faces, and you will get addicted to this game if you put the time into learning everything. It's a very fun game, and a unique one too. Not any other games out like dead by daylight, and no game currently comes close to its level of enjoyment for me right now.
I hope we can play as randomly as survivor or killer with friends and random

Dead by Daylight, 

ist, wie ich finde, ein sehr unterhaltsames und "actiongeladenes" Spiel, das für Horrorfilm/spiel-Enthusiasten eine Palette an Killern, Survivors und schaurigen Karten liefert. Trotz einiger, zum Teil nerviger und sich wiederholender Bugs (besonders nach einem neuen Patch) und einem eher fragwürdigen Matchmaking machen mir die Partien nach ca 350 h immer noch eine Menge Spaß (vor allem als Survivor). Das liegt hierbei besonders an den Jagden, den abwechslungsreichen Lobbys und dem Zusammenspiel mit Freunden in einer Multiplayer-Lobby. Weiterhin gibt es hin und wieder ein paar gute Events, die die Spiellust steigern und die dafür sorgen, das man regelmäßig spielt und am Ball bleibt. 

Nach ca. 5 Jahren hat sich das Spiel mMn richtig gut entwickelt, was man anhand der zahlreichen DLC's, der Überarbeitung der Grafiken und der ständigen Verbesserung der Spielmechaniken (und Perks) feststellen kann. Auch wenn die Lobbys ("Random"-Mitspieler) einem hin und wieder eine Partie versauen können, ist es trotzdem möglich, die ein oder andere lustige Partie zu erhaschen. Das ist dann besonders der Fall, wenn man mit seinen Freunden (1-3) in eine Partie startet und sich absprechen kann, während man versucht, den Killer auszutricksen. Die Killer können hierbei, neben den zufälligen Survivors, jedoch auch hin und wieder Frust generieren - besonders wenn sehr toxisch gespielt wird. 

Alles in allem würde ich DBD eine 8/10 geben und es jedem empfehlen, dem Actionspiele oder einfach das "Horror-Genre" gefallen.

Sviluppatori attenti (anche se non troppo tempestivi) nel correggere le imperfezioni.
Il gioco migliorato un sacco nel corso degli anni.

Col tempo è diventato molto vario anche se alla lunga un poco ripetitivo (Andrebbero aggiunti qualche oggetto nuovo e qualche modalità temporanea).

J'aime le concept, j'aime le lore, j'aime l'ambiance...
Mais le jeu m'irrite beaucoup, les développeurs surtout !
Nom de dieu en quatre années le seul truc qui s'est développé c'est le marché et les licence payantes (ouaaaa ils ont retouché les maps, elles sont toujours déguelasses mais dans un autre style) ! Pas comme ci le jeu souffrait de n'avoir qu'un seul mode, de gros déséquilibres, des serveurs en carton, un matchmaking Hasardeux, des bugs de collisions à la pelle...
Les développeurs sont des charlatants qui ne font que sortir du contenu payant et des tueurs de licence qui ne sont là que pour satisfaire celui qui paie au détriments des autres... Et pour courroner le tout la commu est extrement toxique (aussi bien en coop qu'en versus...). 
Donc prennez-le pour jouer avec vos amis qui n'auront pas payé pour jouer un tueur de licence en partie privée et ça devrait le faire. Sinon ignorez le sechement en message aux développeurs avides de thune.
Dbd is a great and balanced game without any bugs
